Text: So...the meeting place is the capital's plaza.

...It's rare for Beta to ask for a meeting. What in
the world does she want? ...Well, guess I'll find
out once I get there.
(Yesterday, I found a letter in my dorm's mailbox.)

(The sender was Beta, and it was a brief note that
read, "I will be waiting for you tomorrow at the
capital's plaza at the following time—")

(I'm heading towards the designated location, excited
by the mysterious message that seems to hint at the
start of something interesting.)
Alright...should be around here.

Cid arrives precisely on time at the meeting point
and looks around.
Ah, there she is... Huh?
Beta stands there, dressed casually.

(You can totally tell she's Natsume Kafka. Won't
someone recognize her? If they do, it's all over...
Not that that's my concern...)

(...No, wait. There may be something to a celebrity
doing something so brazen that no one recognizes her.
That would explain why she's acting so laid back...)

(And judging by the contents of that letter...
She might be testing me.)

(In that case...fine. Let's go with something from a
spy film. This calls for the stereotypical spy move
of "standing next to an associate as if you were
strangers and talking without making eye contact.")
...Well, let's get started.
Cid nonchalantly walks up and stands next to Beta.
...*ahem*
Hmm?
...M-Master Sha—

Surprised, Beta nearly says "Master Shadow,"
but hastily interrupts herself.

...Ahem. Sorry for losing my cool... How long have
you been here?

Jeez... If you were here, you could have
just said something.

Heh. You've still got a ways to go if you didn't even
notice me...
My apologies...
...Pay attention to your surroundings.
My surroundings? Understood!

(Huh?! True, it's dangerous for me to make contact
with Master Shadow so recklessly... Who knows where
the Cult has eyes?!)

(I called Master Shadow here because I was so
embarrassed to visit his dorm and be alone with
him, and now I've made a complete mess of things!
Beta, you idiot! You darn idiot!)

Aahh... My apologies for choosing such a public
area...
Don't worry about it... So, what do you have for me?
...Oh, excuse me. ...Here, this is for you.
Beta hands him a single envelope and a package.
What's this?
An invitation from Mitsugoshi and a special outfit.
An invitation and special outfit...

(That's got a good ring to it... Is it an undercover
event where we infiltrate some aristocrat's party?
Maybe there's a fancy dress code or something
inside...)
We've prepared a special "event" for you.
...Can I get my hopes up for this event?

...O-Of course! It'll take place the day after
tomorrow at—
Hey, isn't that Natsume Kafka?
...Huh?

You're right! That adorably beautiful silver-haired
elf girl—that's totally her! Maybe there's some kind
of event?

With those words from the passerby, people nearby
begin to notice Beta's presence.
Whoops! Oh no! I'll be going then!

Please read the invitation for further instructions!
W-We look forward to seeing you!
With that, Beta scurries off.

(Wait, hold on, did Beta come here without any plan?
Seriously...)
(Let's get out of here before things get messy...)
Cid preemptively departs the scene.

Oh, Natsume Kafka went that way! Maybe there's some
event going on!
No time to waste! Let's chase after her!

Hey, come to think of it, wasn't someone next to
Natsume just now? It looked like they were having
a friendly conversation...

...There's no one there. Sure you didn't just imagine
it?

...Whew. I nearly got caught up in the whole "Who's
that next to that famous person?!" scenario...

Well, I came prepared with two encoded magical
scripts in case something like that happened.

Anyway, guess I'll check what's in the invitation and
package. Let's see...
Wh-What the...?
To be continued...
